name: brainstorming
description: Facilitate interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques and ideation methods

name: party-mode
description: Orchestrates group discussions between all installed BMAD agents, enabling natural multi-agent conversations

name: agent
description: Tri-modal workflow for creating, editing, and validating BMAD Core compliant agents

name: create-module
description: Interactive workflow to build complete BMAD modules with agents, workflows, and installation infrastructure

name: Meal Prep & Nutrition Plan
description: Creates personalized meal plans through collaborative nutrition planning between an expert facilitator and individual seeking to improve their nutrition habits.

name: create-workflow
description: Create structured standalone workflows using markdown-based step architecture

name: edit-workflow
description: Intelligent workflow editor that helps modify existing workflows while following best practices

name: workflow-compliance-check
description: Systematic validation of workflows against BMAD standards with adversarial analysis and detailed reporting

name: Project Setup
description: Initialize new research projects by configuring the project template, replacing placeholders (author name, lab, email), setting up project structure, and preparing the environment for research work.

name: Baseline Development
description: Understand state-of-the-art (SOTA) methods and implement baseline experiments. Combines literature understanding, experimental implementation, and initial paper writing to establish experimental foundation.

name: Contribution Development
description: Develop novel research contributions through iterative experimentation and paper writing. Combines strategic guidance, experimental implementation, and writing to create and document new research contributions.

name: Review & Revision
description: Handle review rounds, rebuttals, and paper revisions. Combines quality review, strategic guidance, and writing to improve papers and respond to feedback.
